did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Reports on the Boston, Massachusetts Police Strike, 1919
did.origination: Police Commissioner of the City of Boston; Citizens' Committee
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Photocopies of reports relating to the Boston, Massachusetts Police Strike of September 9, 1919.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of photocopies of the 14th Annual Report of the Police Commissioner of the City of Boston (1919) and the Report of the Committee Appointed by Mayor Peters to Consider the Police Situation (1919). Both relate to the police strike of 1919 in Boston.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Reports on the Boston, Massachusetts Police Strike #5303m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: 14th Annual Report of the Police Commissioner of the City of Boston; Report of the Committee Appointed by Mayor Peters to Consider the Police Situation
